summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Drainage and Wastewater Utility; amending Seattle Municipal Code Section 21.28.370 to adjust the 1995 and 1996 wastewater rates; amending Section 21.33.030 of the Seattle Municipal Code to adjust drainage rates; and amending Subsection A of Seattle Municipal Code Section 21.76.040 to revise credits to qualified low-income customers.
